name: AGORA (Pol Clarissou)
description:
AGORA

a short experience, with specific warning for flashing images

made by Pol Clarissou · @polclarissou · polclarissou.com
in about 5 hours for the 33th Ludum Dare · ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/

rate & comment → http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=18149

play by pressing the left mouse button or the spacebar, the mouse also lets you look around.
there is an ending - so to speak. on webplayer, you can press enter to replay once you reached it.

the sounds were made using Barnaque's toyware Éphormère · barnaque.itch.io/ephormere

<•> <•>
